DESCRIPTION: Setup welcome/goodbye messages on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}sethibye welcome channel [#Channel]** ~ Set a channel to send the welcome messages to.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}sethibye welcome channel** ~ Removes the welcome channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}sethibye welcome dm** ~ Toggles whether the welcome message will be sent in DM.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}sethibye welcome message [Message Or JSON Code]** ~ Sets the message to be sent. Use a JSON Code if you wish to send a custom Embed. Use the {{prefix}}embed command to create your embed.
EXTENDED_LINE_5: NOTE: To setup goodbye settings, simply change the `welcome` to `goodbye`.
USAGE: {{prefix}}sethibye [welcome | goodbye] [channel | dm | message] [#Channel | Message JSON Code]
WELCOME_CHANNEL_SET: The welcome channel has been set.
GOODBYE_CHANNEL_SET: The goodbye channel has been set.
WELCOME_CHANNEL_RESET: The welcome channel has been removed.
WELCOME_DM_ENABLED: The welcome messages will be sent by DM.
WELCOME_DM_DISABLED: The welcome message will no longer be sent by DM.
GOODBYE_DM_ENABLED: The goodbye messages will be sent by DM if the user still shares another server.
GOODBYE_DM_DISABLED: The goodbye messages will no longer be sent by DM.
NEED_MESSAGE: You did not provide a message to send.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_SET: The welcome message has been set.
GOODBYE_MESSAGE_SET: The goodbye message has been set.
